channel.title: faux painting videos
channel.description: Sandy Silva has been dedicated to the faux painting business for 10 years and has, by the grace of God, developed a totally new and innovative faux finishing system. Her website contains articles and tips and great prices for the needed faux painting tools of the trade, too.
channel.itunes:author: s_silva@yahoo.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Fastest and Easiest way to Faux Paint
channel.itunes:summary: Instructional and promotional videos to show you how easy it is to learn how to faux paint various popular faux painting techniques in less than half the time that other methods take.
